feed.title: Fort Good Hope - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort Good Hope
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:06 AM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Good Hope Airport 10:00 AM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
